name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience in software development, focusing on **Python** and **MLOps** including hands-on expertise with **TensorFlow**, **Kubeflow**, and **Airflow**. Proficient in deploying cloud solutions leveraging **Google Cloud Platform** services such as **BigQuery**, **BigTable**, and **GCS**. Adept at implementing **CI/CD** practices with tools like **Git**, **GitLab**, and **Jira**, and comfortable in Agile and DevOps environments.

Demonstrated success in building high-performance applications across healthcare and financial sectors, incorporating **microservices** and **event-driven architectures**. Strong background in data processing using **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **Spark**, with a commitment to compliance-driven development aligning with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Excellent communication and collaboration skills, with a strong initiative and commitment to continuous learning.

experience.responsibilities:
• Developed full-stack solutions leveraging **Python** and **MLOps** methodologies, ensuring seamless integration with **Google Cloud Platform** services for enhanced performance and scalability.
• Led the design and implementation of CI/CD pipelines utilizing **GitLab**, **GitHub Actions**, and **CircleCI**, achieving a **30% reduction** in deployment times while maintaining rigorous testing protocols.
• Collaborated in Agile environments with cross-functional teams, facilitating efficient communication and agile project management using tools like **Jira** and **Productboard**.
• Created reliable microservices architectures through the utilization of **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, improving system scalability and ensuring deployment across multiple environments.
• Managed and optimized data storage solutions with **MongoDB** and **Redis**, achieving a **40% improvement** in query performance for health and finance applications.
• Developed and deployed machine learning models utilizing frameworks including **TensorFlow**, **Scikit-learn**, and **Kubeflow**, leading to enhanced predictive capabilities for real-time analytics.
• Implemented robust MLOps workflows with **Airflow** and **Prefect**, streamlining model training and deployment processes across various stages of the development lifecycle.
• Enhanced data visualization capabilities using tools like **Grafana** and **Power BI Embedded**, resulting in clearer insights and increased stakeholder engagement in project findings.
• Established strong testing frameworks incorporating tools such as **Sentry** and **PyTest**, significantly improving code quality and reliability across applications.
• Actively pursued continuous learning and development within the tech stack, focusing on new technologies and best practices to drive innovation in projects.

Utilized **Python** and **scikit-learn** to develop and deploy machine learning models for fraud detection, significantly enhancing transaction monitoring with a focus on accuracy and efficiency.
Implemented **MLOps** practices to create ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring, churn prediction, and transaction classification, ensuring seamless integration into backend services and continuous improvement.
Designed robust ETL pipelines leveraging **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Data Factory** for ingesting financial data from both internal and third-party sources, effectively supporting batch and real-time processing.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams utilizing **Agile** methodologies and tools like **Jira** and **GitLab** to streamline project management and enhance communication on a daily basis.
Contributed to the modernization of core financial platforms by migrating to microservices architecture using **Node.js** (NestJS/Express) and **Python** (FastAPI, Django), improving application scalability and performance for high-volume transactions by **30%**.
Developed interactive front-end applications with **React** (18), **Vue 3**, and **Next.js**, employing **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit** to deliver responsive user interfaces and a seamless user experience.
Produced real-time analytics dashboards using **D3.js** and **Power BI Embedded**, equipping operations teams with immediate insights into transactional anomalies, resulting in a **50%** reduction in response time for critical alerts.
Designed and implemented an event-driven architecture using **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus** to enhance asynchronous communication across crucial workflows including payments and compliance checks.
Employed tools such as **Grafana** and **Sentry** for monitoring and error tracking, ensuring high system reliability and proactive issue resolution to maintain uptime above **99.9%**.

Utilized **Python** and **Google Cloud Platform** technologies, including **TensorFlow** and **MLOps** to design and optimize backend services for a global e-commerce platform, achieving a system uptime of **99.9%** and supporting up to **100,000** concurrent users.
Engineered real-time features with **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** for responsive order updates and dynamic inventory tracking, enhancing customer experience and reducing update latency to less than **200ms**.
Developed frontend applications using **React 18**, **Vue 3**, and **Angular**, incorporating **TypeScript** and **Redux Toolkit**, which resulted in a **30%** increase in user engagement and a sustainable path toward mobile-first design.
Leveraged **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **Cassandra** for distributed data storage, ensuring quick access to data for high-traffic workflows and implementing caching strategies that led to improved retrieval times by **50%**.
Integrated AI/ML-based recommendation systems using **scikit-learn**, **LightGBM**, and **TensorFlow**, achieving a **20%** increase in product conversion rates through better search relevance and personalized recommendations.
Implemented caching with **Redis** for product metadata and search results, drastically improving response times and decreasing database read loads by **40%**.
Executed feature flagging and blue-green deployments utilizing **Kubernetes** and **LaunchDarkly**, which facilitated controlled rollouts and A/B testing, decreasing deployment-related incidents by **15%**.
Created responsive and SEO-friendly e-commerce UIs with **Next.js** and **HTML5/CSS3**, ensuring compliance with accessibility standards (WCAG 2.1) and improving mobile user experience ratings.
Built secure payment processing workflows with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, ensuring robust PCI compliance and improving transaction processing speeds by **10%**.
Applied role-based access control (**RBAC**) and **OAuth 2.0** protocols for secure customer and admin access, sustaining GDPR compliance and enhancing data protection across the platform.
